Author: Microsoft Events
Title: Embrace unified digital resilience with Cisco and Microsoft | BRKSP483
Description:
Discover how Cisco and Microsoft deliver unified digital resilience by integrating visibility, security, automation, and AI-driven insights on Microsoft Azure. Learn how this partnership transforms security operations with AI-powered unified threat detection, investigation and response that accelerates threat detection, operational efficiency, and business continuity.
